tool_description: Get a list of all countries with their country codes and currency codes.
name: All Country & Currency Codes
title: All Country & Currency Codes

api_list.name: All Country & Currency Codes
api_list.description: Returns all countries with their corresponding country code and three letter currency code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-country-currency-codes.p.rapidapi.com/all-countries-country-and-currency-codes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-country-currency-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-country-currency-codes.p.rapidapi.com/all-countries-country-and-currency-codes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-country-currency-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
